meanings.sent1: She enjoyed upthrowing the ball high into the sky.
meanings.sent2: He upthrew the paper airplane and watched it soar.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved upthrowing the cards to the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The upthrowing of confetti at the celebration added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The child's laughter filled the park as he upthrew the leaves in the air.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing something upward.
meanings.sent1: The upthrowing of the ball was impressive to watch.
meanings.sent2: During the game, there was a lot of upthrowing of the disc.
meanings.sent3: The upthrowing of the hat during the performance surprised the audience.
meanings.sent4: The upthrowing of the bouquet at the wedding symbolized joy and celebration.
meanings.sent5: The upthrowing of the coins into the fountain was believed to bring good luck.
